articles.title: Chelsea consider PSG raid amid fears Reece James could join Man City or Real Madrid - Express
articles.description: CHELSEA star Reece James is reportedly attracting interest from Manchester City and Real Madrid.
articles.content: Chelsea have reportedly revived their interest in Paris-Saint Germain's Achraf Hakimi amid fears Manchester City or Real Madrid could make a swoop for Reece James. The 22-year-old has been one of the… [+2010 chars]

articles.title: Ollie Robinson suffers further fitness setback after testing positive for Covid - ESPNcricinfo
